item.title: Russian strikes hit gas pipeline, cut electricity in Ukraine, officials say
item.description: Russian forces injured five people, damaged homes and a gas pipeline in attacks on the southern Ukrainian city of Kherson overnight on Wednesday.

item.title: Yemen war plans group chat: A timeline of the mishap
item.description: Officials inadvertently added a reporter to an unsecured group chat discussing plans for a U.S. attack on Houthis in Yemen. Here's a look at a timelin...

item.title: 'F-18s LAUNCH': Atlantic publishes purported Yemen strike details from Signal chat
item.description: The Atlantic on Wednesday published a new article detailing information about recent American strikes in Yemen that was accidentally shared with a jou...

item.title: Former intel officials not buying White House dismissals of Signal chat risks
item.description: The chat "failed soldiers, diplomats and intelligence officers," an expert said.

item.title: Republicans accuse NPR, PBS of bias at hearing; Democrats say its a partisan attack
item.description: The hearing was held by the Delivering on Government Efficiency subcommittee.
